abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Second Student
            Loan Support Project for Colombia are as follows: (a) to
            improve coverage by increasing the enrollment and graduation
            rates of students in tertiary education; (b) improve equity
            by increasing enrollment and graduation rates of tertiary
            education students from economically disadvantaged
            backgrounds; and (c) increase and diversify the sources of
            alternative funding available to Colombian Institute for
            Student Credit (ICETEX) in order to increase ICETEX's
            sustainability. The extension is necessary to continue
            supporting ICETEX to scale up the provision of student loans
            to students from the lowest socioeconomic strata, in a
            rapidly changing context for higher education in Colombia.
            The Borrower has an action plan that is acceptable to the
            Bank and ICETEX is likely to meet its targets for key
            outcome and intermediate results indicators by the revised
            closing date. This will be the second extension of the
            project. The first extended the project's closing date
            for 18 months, from December 31, 2010 to June 30, 2012.
